data.expected_result: To see it update in the search menu.
data.short_description: when unblocking a user in search, it doesnt allow you to jump back to an old message
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up search - see blocked user that mentioned you - unblock while search is still open - try to jump back, and find that it still gives you the "Oh no, unblock the person to jump back to a message"
